title: Bookmark, 1893
inscribed: On bookmark: "Souvenir of the World's Columbian Exposition" "Machinery HallChicago 1893" on paper wrapper;"Twelve highest medals awarded to Phoenix Silk Manufacturing Company (pictures of medals) Manufacturers of illuminated silk bookmarkers,badges etc.etc. Patterson, N.J. Allentown, Pa. Pottstown, Pa.". at bottom "Woven at the World's Columbian Exposition, Machinery Department, Annes 28 Column 049 Chicago 1893.
dimensions: bookmark. Warp: 26.5 (10 1/2). Weft: 6.5cm (2 1/2in.). Bopth selvedges present. Paper wrapper: Height:46.5cm (18 1/4in.). Width: 8.5cm (3 3/8in.).
description: Bookmark with writing at top, eagle and flags in the center and a view of Machinery Hall at the bottom. Paper wrapper accompanies bookmark.
